name: V3 Data type TEL (TelecommunicationAddress)
description: A telephone number (voice or fax), e-mail address, or other locator for a resource mediated by telecommunication equipment. The address is specified as a Universal Resource Locator (URL) qualified by time specification and use codes that help in deciding which address to use for a given time and purpose.

element.label: Exceptional Value Detail
element.definition: If a value is an exceptional value (NULL-value), this specifies in what way and why proper information is missing.

element.label: Useable Period
element.definition: Specifies the periods of time during which the telecommunication address can be used. For a telephone number, this can indicate the time of day in which the party can be reached on that telephone. For a web address, it may specify a time range in which the web content is promised to be available under the given address.

element.label: Use Code
element.definition: One or more codes advising a system or user which telecommunication address in a set of like addresses to select for a given telecommunication need.
